pullRequest.title: wappalyzer: Add support for CSS inspection/patterns
pullRequest.bodyText:
Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#6180

Added necessary infrastructure/code.
Added unit tests.
Add CHANGELOG notes.
Rolled version identifier to 21.0.0 (since now targeting ZAP 2.10,
which is somewhat breaking).

Signed-off-by: kingthorin kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com

nodes.bodyText: Could be singular? Would match more of the others.

commit.message:
wappalyzer: Add support for CSS inspection/patterns

Part of zaproxy/zaproxy#6180

- Added necessary infrastructure/code.
- Added unit tests.
- Add CHANGELOG notes.
- Rolled version identifier to 21.0.0 (since now targeting ZAP 2.10,
which is somewhat breaking).

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>
